title: Top 50 LeetCode Questions
content: Focus on the 'Blind 75' list. It covers all major patterns like Sliding Window, Two Pointers, and DP.

title: System Design Interview Guide
content: Start with high-level design. Define requirements, estimate scale, and then dive into components like Load Balancers and Caching.

title: How to Approach DP Problems
content: 1. Define the subproblem. 2. Find the recurrence relation. 3. Identify base cases. 4. Memoize or use tabulation.

title: Build Personal Brand on Twitter
content: Share what you learn daily (#BuildInPublic). Engage with other developers. Write threads about your projects.

title: Getting Free Cloud Credits
content: Students can get $100+ credits on AWS, Azure, and DigitalOcean via GitHub Student Developer Pack.

title: Freelancing as a Student
content: Start on Upwork or Fiverr. Focus on a niche like 'React Landing Pages' or 'Python Scripts'. Build a portfolio first.

title: Pomodoro Technique
content: Work for 25 minutes, break for 5. After 4 cycles, take a long break. Helps maintain focus and avoid burnout.

title: Feynman Method
content: To learn something, try to explain it to a 5-year-old. Identify gaps in your understanding and review the material.

title: Negotiating Your First Salary
content: Always negotiate. Research market rates. Focus on the value you bring, not your needs. Don't be afraid to ask.

title: Building Portfolio Projects
content: Don't just build to-do apps. Build clones of popular apps or solve a real problem you have. Deploy it and share the link.
